Title: Retraining the Trainees
Description:
Your witch doctor is trying to twist the trial to empower Mueh'zala. Many will be enthralled by this power, but we still stand with the Darkspear.

I had a different trial in mind. Now, we adapt. Free your fellow trolls from his sacrificial magic. Dis charm will help them, but you must weaken them first.

Try not to sacrifice dem.
ObjectivesText: Extract 8 shadows from lost trainees after weakening them.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Rokhan in the Echo Isles.
